title: Indicted or Barred From the Ballot: For Trump, Bad News Cements Support
subtitle: Donald Trump has raised cash off of his indictments and encouraged Republican officials to defend him, as his rivals did after the Colorado ruling.

title: Trump Is Disqualified From 2024 Ballot, Colorado Court Rules
subtitle: The ruling, which said former President Trump engaged in insurrection, applies only to Colorado. His campaign said it would appeal to the Supreme Court.

title: Hamas Leader Makes Visit to Egypt for Gaza Talks
subtitle: The leader, Ismail Haniyeh, was in Egypt to discuss the possibility of a new truce with Israel, a senior Hamas official said.

subtitle: The agreement was aimed at allaying pressures from the far right amid rising anti-migrant sentiment in Europe and beyond.

title: In a Tough Year on Land, Drones Give Ukraine Some Success at Sea
subtitle: The use of sea drones highlights a path forward for Ukraine in its fight with Russia. It has also been promoted by U.S. and Ukrainian leadership.

subtitle: Scientists are exploring whether the new diabetes and weight-loss drugs could also treat addiction, kidney disease and more.

subtitle: Buying mattresses, clothes and other goods on installment plans has propped up spending, but economists worry that such loans could put people at risk.

subtitle: The Federal Trade Commission proposed privacy changes that could curb how social media, game and learning apps use and monetize young people’s data.
